ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 243
ygData.msgSnippet: Of course for those of us out there who are Warriors and Rogues....boy do we have a rough life! :( There are many +int/wis items out there that just aren t
ygData.messageBody:
Of course for those of us out there who are Warriors
and Rogues....boy do we have a rough life! :( There
are many +int/wis items out there that just aren't
available to warriors and rogues.

I've still managed to make a tidy profit as a warrior
tinkerer (until I started attempting aqualungs *grr*)

For the rogues and warriors out there we can only hope
STR, DEX and AGI fit into the success ratio somehow :)

-alewuf shinkciker of povar
Gem Chopper of the 40th season
Master of Tinkering (102)


--- Isabella Tickler <macootie@...> wrote:
> To answer Zanren's question, you can enhance your
> int/wisdom with several pieces of jewelry (+4 int
> rings, plat sapphire necklace, bracelets of woven
> grass, earrings +2), plus oracle robe (which adds
> both
> wis and int), wolf fur slippers, gatorskin leggings,
> stein of mogguk, pet focus items (for magicians
> only),
> runed circlet etc. Sorry I'm trying to go by memory.
>
